mapper.select: select m.* , (select count(market_idx) from MARKET_LIKE where m.market_idx=market_idx) cnt, (select count(market_idx) from MARKET_LIKE where m.market_idx=market_idx and mem_idx=#{m_idx}) heart_flag from (select * from MARKET) m order by m.market_idx desc
mapper.delete: delete from market_like where market_idx=#{market_idx} and mem_idx=#{mem_idx}
